ValidationRule.description: Savings and Chequing Products must have the corresponding line of product to be added
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( Opportunity.RecordType.DeveloperName= "Savings_Chequing", NOT(ISPICKVAL(Product2.Family, 'JN Bank Deposit Account')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This product is not apart of the Savings and Chequing's Line of Products. Please add a product corresponding to the Savings and Chequing's lines of product or create a new opportunity with a different record type that matches the product.
